Actors: Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze, Elmo Nüganen, Misha Meskhi
Writer: Tatjana Mülbeier (idea), Zaza Urushadze (idea), Zaza Urushadze, Artur Veeber (idea)
Title: Tangerines
Plot: War in Georgia, Apkhazeti region in 1990. An Estonian man Ivo has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo is forced to take him in.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 12 wins & 7 nominations.
